overview: Brazil , 2016 - post-coup period. Pedro is a producer of university films. Queer, anxious and methodical, he only wants a quiet filming set. Câmera Calibre is a short film that talks about resistance: resistance of making independent cinema in Brazil, of being gay in a Brazilian city with a high index of homophobia and of being represented as such on screen - and political resistance in light of a coup against democracy.
title: Caliber Camera
